Reviews.Title: Did really well
Reviews.Author: Joe J.
Reviews.Content: They did really well with their customer service, the phone wasn't EXACTLY as they described. It says it's a 16gb but it does not come with a memory card so technically it's and 8gb. But they did what they could to resolve the issue. And I am satisfied with their service.

Reviews.Title: Droid Razr Excellent phone and great price!
Reviews.Author: Jimmy N
Reviews.Content: So far so good! Clean ESN, phone in very good cosmetic condition. Brought phone to Verizon last night to get a SIM card. Battery took a full charge and has lasted 12 hours so far. At this point, I am pretty impressed with Chubbiestech. I am considering purchasing an additional phone and looks like this is the place to go!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Mary Groesbeck
Reviews.Content: My husband's phone toppled from his pocket to the floor and the "gorilla glass" screen shattered--it was even in a protective case!  The first one of these I had shattered, too.  My second one, the sound went out.  My household has gone through 3 of these in only a year.  Time for a new phone, and it WON'T be this one.

Reviews.Title: Droid Razr By Motorola in Cranberry (Red) 16gb Xt912r Verizon mine is 16GB as stated I know one buyer said hers was not.
Reviews.Author: Colleen
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone screen in perfect shape. The only problem I had was using it for prepaid. I did research before buy and after, but couldn't find who said it work on straight talk service, but it doesn't. So I had it flashed to Cricket problem solved. Love this phone. thanks so much .

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand new never used Verizon Droid Razr
4G LTE Global Ready
ProductInfo.Name: Droid Razr By Motorola in Cranberry (Red) 16gb Xt912r Verizon
